inclusion.criterion: Severe carotid artery stenosis (unilateral stenosis > 70%) diagnosed according to angiography
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Provision of informed consent regarding trial procedure
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: patient reported no use of lipid-lowering medications

exclusion.criterion: Severe cardiovascular, hepatic, renal, or blood system diseases
exclusion.label: not_met
exclusion.evidence: patient has no other cardiovascular risk factors such as smoking, high blood pressure, and diabetes mellitus

exclusion.criterion: Hemorrhagic disease or unable to receive anticoagulation or antiplatelet aggregation
exclusion.label: not_met
exclusion.evidence: patient's LDL-C and HDL-C levels were 545 and 53 mg/dL, respectively

exclusion.criterion: Unable to or declined to cooperate with follow-up examination
exclusion.label: met
exclusion.evidence: patient is physically active and able to provide informed consent

notes: The patient has severe carotid artery stenosis, but no other cardiovascular risk factors. He is provisionally eligible for the trial.
